column2: Complete the sentences. Put the verb in the correct form (present).

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the verb in the correct form (present).

column3: All these toys {{c1::are made}} (make) of wood.

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the verb in the correct form (present).

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the verb in the correct form (present).

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the verb in the correct form (present).
